issue.title: [Java/Python] Add support for dictionary type to pyarrow.Field.from_jvm
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2610](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2610). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The DictionaryType is a bit more complex as it also references the dictionary values itself. This also needs to be integrated into `pyarrow.Field.from_jvm` but the work to make DictionaryType working maybe also depends on that `pyarrow.Array.from_jvm` first supports non-primitive arrays.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2610?focusedCommentId=16852506) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This should be less complex now after the recent DictionaryType changes
